books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: The 23rd book in the Women’s Murder Club series. Lindsay Boxer tracks a copycat killer.
books.name: THE 23RD MIDNIGHT

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: A former couple pretend to be together for the sake of their friends during their annual getaway in Maine.
books.name: HAPPY PLACE

books.author: by Carley Fortune
books.description: A decade after a one-day adventure, Will appears again in Fern’s life at her mother’s lakeside resort.
books.name: MEET ME AT THE LAKE

books.author: by Abraham Verghese
books.description: Three generations of a family living on South India’s Malabar Coast suffer the loss of a family member by drowning.
books.name: THE COVENANT OF WATER

books.author: by Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.
books.name: FOURTH WING

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: An unmarried wedding planner contends with problems, secrets and scandals.
books.name: THE WEDDING PLANNER

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Bonnie Garmus
books.description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.
books.name: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A former detective becomes the prime suspect in a murder case involving a man with mob ties who was in witness protection.
books.name: SIMPLY LIES

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: In the sequel to “It Ends With Us,” Lily deals with her jealous ex-husband as she reconnects with her first boyfriend.
books.name: IT STARTS WITH US

books.author: by Laura Dave
books.description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.
books.name: THE LAST THING HE TOLD ME

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Mo Xiang Tong Xiu
books.description: The future of the entire cultivation world comes down to a showdown at Guanyin Temple.
books.name: GRANDMASTER OF DEMONIC CULTIVATION: MO DAO ZU SHI, VOL. 5

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Ann Napolitano
books.description: In a homage to Louisa May Alcott’s “Little Women,” a young man’s dark past resurfaces as he gets to know the family of his college sweetheart.
books.name: HELLO BEAUTIFUL
